Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.3 Abyākatapada » 2.4.3.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
67.
1399Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
68.
1400Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
